name: Invert
headline: Data analytics software for biomanufacturing.
description: We build software to manage, analyze, and optimize bioprocessing data. Our initial customers are bio-industrial companies, who produce various products in bioreactors.

founders.name: Martin T. Permin, Founder
founders.description:
Hi, I'm Martin. I care about bio and data stuff. I also like to run really long distances on mountain trails.

Previously, I worked at Airbnb, and Hive (YC s14).

founders.name: Mads Ingwar, Founder
founders.description: Hiâ€“I'm Mads. I like numbers, data and machine learning stuff.

founders.name: Holger Thorup, Founder
founders.description: Hey, I am Holger ðŸ‘‹  I'm engineer and product person. I've built a handful of companies and most recently was VP Eng. at Zeronorth.

# Software that handles the data from your‍bio|
Get clean, standardized, AI-ready bioprocess data from any source. Analyze your data directly in Invert, train models, set up automations, and more.
Thank you! We look forward to meeting you.
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/6710334827b3e3017518abea_hero1.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/671033485fa272f3cdeb16eb_hero2.avif)
We integrate with
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/6710334893f2db79b20d4ed2_Solaris%20Logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/6725462a5c76877191ba7cc9_cytiva-logo%20\(2\)%201.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/6725463735778f06a7240e8c_image%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/672546413b499ee71384d7e9_image%202.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/67103e320ae409a958a1a452_DistekLogo.png)

product demo
## See Invert in action.
Clean, standardized data is just the beginning. Explore our suite of data management, analysis, and modeling tools.
[Plan](http://www.invertbio.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Explore](http://www.invertbio.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Analyze](http://www.invertbio.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Model](http://www.invertbio.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Collaborate](http://www.invertbio.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)
### Plan
Streamline planning, coordination, and execution of experiments.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/674051bc27fd105118087e2f_Screenshot%20Image.avif)
### Explore
Easily find the data you need, and deep dive into any analysis you'd like.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/67191cdd451814ebde793b7b_carousel%202.avif)
### Analyze
Replace manual workflows in spreadsheets or statistical software. Calculate anything using powerful statistical features.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/67191cf22b99698b464a6d97_carousel%203.avif)
### Model
Reduce cycle times using predictive models trained on your own data
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/6733390a507e739c1475dd01_model_dashboard.avif)
### Collaborate
Automatically generate reports based on recent runs. Add interactive plots, calculations, and comments and share with internal or external collaborators.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/67191d0700323cce0abfea26_CleanShot%202024-10-23%20at%2011.13.25%402x.avif)
See our products
## Explore our full product suite.
From integration to analysis to modelingâ€”find all the tools you need to manage and make sense of your data.
[IntegrationsIntegrates with all your hardware.Learn more about Invertâ€™s hardware integrations.](http://www.invertbio.com/</integrations>)[IntegrationsWorks with all your software.Learn more about Invertâ€™s software integrations.](http://www.invertbio.com/</integrations>)[Data ManagementAutomatically cleans and structures your data.Learn more about Invertâ€™s data management tools.](http://www.invertbio.com/</data-management>)[AnalysisOverlay and analyze your data.Get to know our analysis tools.](http://www.invertbio.com/</analysis>)[ModelingTrain models on your data.Explore our model frameworks and MLOps features.](http://www.invertbio.com/</modeling>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/6710fefebe8fa46ef82b5d6f_21st%20bio%20logo%20\(testimonial\)%201.avif)
Invert has been critical in managing and analyzing the large amounts of data we generate, and in making it easy to access that data across two sites and many external collaborators. Weâ€™re happy customers!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/6710ff87369974c4054618a8_image.avif)
Per Falholt
CSO, 21st Bio
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/672233ae09bfb2cd8e7b5682_image.png)
 _Invert has streamlined our data analysis and made it effortless to manage large bioprocess datasets from various platforms and scales. Our team can now quickly compare results across different scales and share insights organization-wide, saving us significant time and effort._
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/672233d1ac42d3a20acdbf95_image%20\(1\).png)
Mona Mirsiaghi
Director of Fermentation, Inscripta

key features
## Engineered for reliability.
Explore the key features that Invert makes bioprocess development faster and more reliable.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/6711055dca09c245e4b020a1_Frame%2058.svg)
### Metric Management
Merge metrics from all your sources for data consistency and quality control.
[Learn more about Invertâ€™s Data Management features â†—](http://www.invertbio.com/</data-management>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/6711055da5f8327c54974c9c_Frame%2059.svg)
### Lineage
Characterize your end-to-end process. Identify bottlenecks and understand interactions between upstream and downstream unit operations.
[Learn more about Invert's Analysis features â†—](http://www.invertbio.com/</analysis>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/670ff2aa4610217f70c251cf/6711055d81f2ee451eb1556a_Frame%2060.svg)
### Pre-built Models
Easily train models on your data â€“ with or without code.
[Learn more about Invert's Modeling features â†—](http://www.invertbio.com/</modeling>)
## Automated bioprocess data management â€” zero headaches.
Invert offers a complete suite for collecting, cleaning, and contextualizing data - ensuring every analysis and insight is based on reliable, organized data.
Thank you! We look forward to meeting you.

generated_description:
Invert is a software company based in San Francisco, founded in 2021 and notably part of Y Combinator Batch W22. Their mission is to revolutionize data analytics for biomanufacturing, focusing on the management, analysis, and optimization of bioprocessing data. Invert primarily serves bio-industrial companies that utilize bioreactors to produce various products.

With a team of 25 employees, Invert is spearheaded by Jared Friedman as their Group Partner. The company has carved a niche for itself in the biotech space, tagged with keywords that resonate with cutting-edge innovation â€” from **cellular agriculture** to **machine learning** and **synthetic biology**.

On their platform, Invert enables users to get clean, standardized, and AI-ready data from multiple sources, allowing for seamless analysis, model training, and automation. They provide a suite of integrated tools for data management, analysis, and modeling, simplifying what can often be a daunting process. Their tools empower customers to streamline planning, analyze metrics, and create predictive models, all while ensuring data reliability and consistency.

Their website features various resources, including documentation, pricing, a company blog, and career opportunities, making it easy for potential clients and team members to engage. You can check them out at [Invert Bio](http://www.invertbio.com/).

In summary, Invert is positioned at the intersection of software and biotechnology, focused on enhancing data handling in the biomanufacturing sector. Their vision not only helps companies manage their data more effectively but also accelerates innovation in bio-industrial applications, making a case for a more data-driven future in biotechnology.
